text: "I'm in the Mood" may refer to: * "I'm in the Mood", a U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Music Club Play number-1 single by CeCe Peniston * "I'm in the Mood (John Lee Hooker song)", a 1951 song by John Lee Hooker * I'm in the Mood (album), a 1983 boogie-woogie studio album by Little Willie Littlefield * I'm in the Mood, a song by Raffi on his Rise and Shine 1982 album ==See also== * In the Mood (disambiguation) * I'm in the Mood for Love (disambiguation)
title: I'm in the Mood (disambiguation)
